appetizers.name: Vegetable Uttapan
appetizers.description: Pancake made from rice and lentil, served with sambhar and coconut chutney. Topped with onions, tomatoes, and a touch of cilantro.

appetizers.name: Chicken Uttapan
appetizers.description: Pancake made from rice and lentil, served with sambhar and coconut chutney. Topped with lightly spiced chicken.

appetizers.name: Konkani Shrimp
appetizers.description: Pieces of shrimps cooked with mustard seeds, curry leaves and coconut milk, served with paratha bread.

entrees.name: Tandoori Paneer Tikka
entrees.description: Cubes of homemade cheese (paneer) marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled in the tandoor.

entrees.name: Achari Chicken
entrees.description: Chicken cubes cooked in curry with a touch of spicy pickle flavor.

entrees.name: Garlic Lamb Kadai
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cooked with a touch of garlic, onions, and green pepper in a curry sauce..

entrees.name: Seafood Masala
entrees.description: Shrimps, scallops and tilapia fillets cooked in tikka masala sauce.
